ai-patthana9.7:0.2_0: (This should be expanded as in MN 4.)
ai-patthana9.7:0.3_0: This is the cause of sentient beings—hinfiled in the skillful.
ai-patthana9.7:1.1_0: Not because of this, they don’t cause or reason for the sake of cause or reason.
ai-patthana9.7:1.1_1: Not because of this, they don’t cause or reason for the sake of cause or reason.
ai-patthana9.7:1.1_2: Not because of this, they don’t cause or reason for the sake of cause or reason.
ai-patthana9.7:2.1_0: No cause or reason for doing so.
ai-patthana9.7:3.1_0: not for the sake of deceiving nor making unskillful by way of body or speech, and by causes unskillful qualities to arise because of these three unskillful qualities, nor by the sake of causes and reasons.
ai-patthana9.7:5.1_0: Not because of this, they don’t cause or reason for the sake of cause or reason.
ai-patthana9.7:7.1_0: So for the sake of not deterioration, nor for the sake of deterioration.
ai-patthana9.7:8.1_0: (These nine discourses should be expanded in line with the previous set.)
ai-patthana9.7:9.1_0: (All should be expanded in line with the previous set.)
